name: Beginnings
description:
Partially inspired by House of Leaves, Beginnings takes place in a time loop. What is going on? Where are you? Who are you? Remember, read everything carefully and don't hesitate to run through the loop again to find what you need to solve the puzzles. Everything has an answer.

Beginnings is my first real finished project. It's a beginning for me too! It's a short text adventure/puzzle game/short story, and I'd love for you to discover more about it on your own :) thanks for playing!
